insights.title: The Automation-First Fallacy
insights.description: Most enterprises fail in digital transformation because they automate broken processes. Discover why process optimization must precede automation, and how this sequencing can increase your transformation ROI by over 200%.

insights.title: The Hidden Cost of Shared Services
insights.description: While shared service centers promised significant cost savings, 67% of implementations underdeliver. Learn the three critical flaws in traditional shared services models and how to reimagine them for the digital age.

insights.title: Data Strategy Before Digital Strategy
insights.description: Your digital transformation is only as good as your data strategy. Discover the four foundational elements of a robust data architecture that enables real-time decision-making and operational agility.
